page.title: 03SPROTBROUGH COMMUNITY CENTRE
page.content: The Community Centre is situated on Sprotbrough Road. In 1961 when the Centre was first built, it was only a small wooden hut, but the local community raised some money and had the present Community Centre built. Olga Jean Davy has been the caretaker} at Sprotbrough Community Centre for fourteen years.There have been three other caretakers before her. Mr.Ogden opened the Community Centre in April 1961. The Centre is used for all kinds of activites, like keep-fit dancing and playgroups. The hall is hired for Â£2.25 per hour every day . The hall has a nice and springy floor,and the whole building is well cared for and clean.The Committee Room is fully carpetted.The room has a big window which overlooks a childrens playing field which is used just as an open recreation play area.
